messages.content: Winston McKenzie says: 'Between us we have the opportunity to bring prosperity to the community of Tottenham. Between us the future shall never be in doubt. Yes, we're in with a shout! I have no doubt, so let's work it out, and become... 'Tottenham - an Inspiration to the Nation!'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The UK Independence Party is passionate about coming out of Europe. We will save £45m a day - our daily Taxes to the European Parliament! We will promote our own Laws, reinstate our fishing rights, and save our agricultural and commercial industries.
We will be able to trade freely once again with our former Commonwealth Countries, thus reducing crime and poverty from their daily lives.

Will establish a 'Business Activity Centre' in Tottenham, to empower, enable, enthuse and motivate Entrepreneurs and Small Businesses, new or well-established, to succeed, with access to substantial funding already sourced, hands-on financial assistance and professional guidance.

Will create facilities and activities for our 'Youth', including drop-off and pick-up centres for 'child contact services', plus initiate desperately needed help for Carers, the physically infirm and mentally ill.
I will tackle the local issues of housing and supporting tenants' rights, together with addressing the affects [sic] of the proposed changes to the NHS A&E Departments.

issues.brexitEurope: The UK Independence Party is passionate about coming out of Europe.

housing.content: I will tackle the local issues of housing and supporting tenants' rights.

politicalExperience.role: Chairman and Co-Founder of the Croydon Youth Games
politicalExperience.achievements: A mini-Olympic-style competition for the children of the whole of Greater London, 11-18 years of age.
